news.title: Google Will Update Its Core Web Vitals Metrics on March 12
news.description: Google has officially announced that as of March 12, 2024, the Interaction to Next Paint (INP) metric will replace First Input Delay (FID) as a Core Web Vital.

news.title: Justia Webinars: Effective Time Management for Attorneys
news.description: There are only 24 hours in a day, but sometimes it may feel like you need 48 hours a day just to manage all your cases and law firm business. Even as a busy attorney, you don’t need to compromise! Learn effective time management with Chris Earley and take back those precious hours of your day.

news.title: Google’s Bard AI Makes Its Official Transition to Gemini
news.description: Google updated its AI chatbot, Bard, to Gemini (its latest and most advanced AI model), offering its own Android app and introducing a paid version named Gemini Advanced.
